body:
What would you do with it? :)

I would buy really good gaming equipment so that I can produce better quality videos, just for fun. :)

Also, I would donate to a charity, as well as buy an ATV, pool...  :D

There are more things that I would do, but nothing comes to mind right now.

So, what would you do if you won 10 million dollars?

*Do not make fun of other players' choices".

one third of it to charity, one third to friends and family, one third for me buying hella cool stuff

that's about 3,333,333 each..

Edit:

Nah that's boring. I'd buy a huge house. Just a giant house. I'd invite all of my friends to live there. It'd have giant, themed pool. Probably Star Trek. There'd be super cool rooms, you could go on the roof and chill, it'd be like a five star hotel. But a house.

I would give the rest to my parents and friends.

replies.body:
Use 10 thousand dollars to buy me some good equipment, like a new IPad, a phone, a lot of clothing that's comfortable and some basic supplies for school. 
Use the other 990 thousand of the million to buy some new furniture for my family, some new technology and good equipment and to design our lawn and stuff. 
Use another 1 million for just savings/earnings to buy random stuff like coffee, donuts, whatever. 
Use the last 8 million to start a business.
